participant_1.name: Mary
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, with a strong sense of family values. She's expressive and enjoys sharing her experiences.
participant_1.background: My family works to support my dreams. I got married when I was young. I have been on the tv news six times. My favorite food is raw onion.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and easygoing, enjoys technology and gaming. He is sociable and appreciates the simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution! I sell insurance in Hollywood with my brother-in-law. I never cook. I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head. I try to find easy ways to make money.

content.text: Hi I'm Mary, I'm from Oregon!
Hi there Mary, I'm from California!
It's pretty good, a little too sunny sometimes but it's nice.
Yeah I can see why, I like the rain in Oregon.
Rain is nice, I don't mind it occasionally.
What do you do for a living?
I sell insurance with my brother in law, it's not too bad.
I see, that's cool. I'm a stay at home mom but I used to be a waitress.
Oh that's nice, how many kids do you have?
Just one, a little boy named John.
That's cute, I'm not married yet but I have two dogs.
Dogs are great, I love animals.
Yeah they're the best, do you have any pets?
No, we don't have any pets right now.
Maybe you should get a dog, they're great companions.
Yeah I've been thinking about it, I'll have to look into it.
